mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (userNum, title, content, type, price, area) VALUES (#{userNum}, #{title}, #{content}, #{type}, #{price}, #{area})
mapper.update: UPDATE board set type='0' WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE board SET views = views + 1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, u.nickName FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.userNum = u.num WHERE u.id = #{id} AND type !=0

SELECT u.id, u.num AS userNum, u.nickname, b.num, b.userNum, b.title, b.content, b.type, b.likes, b.views, b.price, b.area, b.registerDate, IFNULL(c.comments_counts, 0) AS comments_counts FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.userNum = u.num LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boardNum, COUNT(*) AS comments_counts FROM comments GROUP BY boardNum ) c ON b.num = c.boardNum WHERE b.type = #{type} ORDER BY b.registerDate DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT b.*, u.nickname, COALESCE(c.comments_counts, 0) AS comments_counts, ((b.views * 0.5 + b.likes * 1.5 + COALESCE(c.comments_counts, 0) * 1.0) / POW(DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.registerDate) + 1, 1.5)) AS popularity_score FROM board b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boardNum, COUNT(*) AS comments_counts FROM comments GROUP BY boardNum ) c ON b.num = c.boardNum JOIN users u ON b.userNum = u.num WHERE b.type = #{type} ORDER BY popularity_score DESC LIMIT 10
